name: Heavenly Sins and Deadly Virtues
description:
Judge poor souls who have passed on from earth and now wait in front of you: the Eternal Judge. Humans will approach you from the doorway and present you with a list of their greatest deeds in life. Reviewing this list you shall judge them, judge wisely as your score depends on it. Swipe or use the arrow keys to send the soul to either heaven or hell. Can be played on mobile and pc. Made by students at the Falmouth Games Academy.

KNOWN BUG. After you start the game if you go to the menu and attempt to play again, either the tutorial button or the start button, they will not work and you will have to restart your game.
